themes.name: Harry Potter Theme
themes.description: Transform your venue into Hogwarts! Complete with mystical decorations, potion bottles, spell books, wizard hats, and magical lighting effects.
themes.customization: House colors, character cutouts, custom signage available

themes.name: Unicorn Theme
themes.description: A magical rainbow world! Pink, purple, and pastel colors with unicorn horns, clouds, rainbows, flowers, and sparkly decorations.
themes.customization: Custom color schemes, name signs, themed food setup

themes.name: Dinosaur Theme
themes.description: Travel back in time! Prehistoric jungle with dinosaur cutouts, dino eggs, volcano setup, fossil displays, and jungle vines.
themes.customization: Custom dinosaur types, interactive dino hunt setup

themes.name: Space/Astronaut Theme
themes.description: Blast off to outer space! Rocket ship, planets, astronauts, stars, UFOs, and glow-in-the-dark elements for an intergalactic adventure.
themes.customization: Custom rocket design, interactive planet setup, astronaut suits

themes.name: Superhero Theme
themes.description: Be a superhero! Character cutouts, power-up stations, city skyline, comic book elements, and heroic decorations.
themes.customization: Custom hero selection, personalized name capes, photo booth setup

themes.name: Princess/Fairy Tale Theme
themes.description: A fairy tale come true! Castle setup, thrones, ball gowns displays, enchanted forest, and magical elements.
themes.customization: Specific princess choice, glass slipper props, carriage setup

themes.name: Sports/Olympic Theme
themes.description: Championship celebration! Medal displays, trophy setups, sports equipment, scoreboard, and athlete photos.
themes.customization: Specific sport focus, custom medals, personalized jersey display

themes.name: Pirate/Treasure Hunt Theme
themes.description: Swashbuckling adventure! Pirate ship, treasure chests, skull & crossbones, wanted posters, and treasure maps.
themes.customization: Interactive treasure hunt setup, custom treasure maps, pirate costumes
